name: Stone Face
summary: Through conditioning or experience, you've mastered the art of composure, even in the face of fear.
description:
Through conditioning or experience, you've mastered the art of composure, even in the face of fear. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against effects with the fear trait, and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Will DC against Intimidate skill actions, such as Demoralize.Traits

Hobgoblin: Hobgoblins are a sturdy, clever people with a propensity for militaristic order
